a lot of the big perp protocols tried utility-based NFTs with varying degrees of success - dYdX Hedgies, GMX Blueberry, GNS NFTs

imo its crucial to figure out whether there is an overlap between your users and the average NFT holder

Term = time

so it‚Äôs pricing/rates/yields at various expirations (time). 

The structure refers to connecting those data points and creating various curve shapes
‚ÄúTerm structure‚Äù generally refers to some form of price/yield curve for a series of related instruments, rather than positions in those instruments
It‚Äôs just called ¬´futures term structure¬ª I believe it would be sth similar for collateral positions structure
